mapper.select: SELECT AC.IDX AS adoptionConsultIdx, A.NAME AS animalName, ACS.NAME AS statusText, DATE_FORMAT(AC.CREATED_AT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS appliedAt FROM ADOPTION_CONSULTS AC JOIN ANIMALS A ON AC.ANIMAL_IDX = A.IDX JOIN ADOPTION_CONSULT_STATUS ACS ON AC.ADOPTION_CONSULT_STATUS_IDX = ACS.IDX WHERE AC.USER_IDX = #{userIdx} ORDER BY AC.CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT A.NAME AS animalName, AB.NAME AS breed, A.GENDER, A.AGE, A.SIZE, A.NEUTER, AP.NAME AS personality, A.DESCRIPTION, ACS.NAME AS statusText, S.SHELTER_NAME AS shelterName FROM ADOPTION_CONSULTS AC JOIN ANIMALS A ON AC.ANIMAL_IDX = A.IDX JOIN ADOPTION_CONSULT_STATUS ACS ON AC.ADOPTION_CONSULT_STATUS_IDX = ACS.IDX JOIN ANIMAL_BREEDS AB ON A.ANIMAL_BREED_IDX = AB.IDX JOIN ANIMAL_PERSONALITIES AP ON A.ANIMAL_PERSONALITY_IDX = AP.IDX JOIN USERS U ON A.USER_IDX = U.IDX AND U.USER_TYPE_IDX = 2 JOIN SHELTERS S ON U.IDX = S.USER_IDX WHERE AC.IDX = #{adoptionConsultIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADOPTION_REVIEWS ( USER_IDX, ANIMAL_IDX, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, REF, LEV, TURN ) VALUES ( #{userIdx}, #{animalIdx}, #{content}, NOW(), 0, 0, 0 )
